author: macfarla
content: Are there any hive or other tests to check the validation that blob transactions can't have an empty `to` field?

author: parithosh
content: rolling the cluster now, but the grafana dash already has data: https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/d/b3aedc8d-cb07-41fa-aed5-c8a3bb78f1ec/blob-metrics?orgId=1

author: techbro_ccoli
content: We have a test for it here (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/blob/c95b81c11459449c02d7fa2681b8b40bf1fcc6f3/tests/cancun/eip4844_blobs/test_blob_txs.py#L767-L787) - but we need to hack a t8n tool to allow us to generate it, we can add it to the next `execution-spec-tests` release before devnet-9 ðŸ˜„
